commonutil

Class ExcelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • commonutil.ExcelReader

  • public class ExcelReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to handle multiple reading operations of content from Excel workbook.
    Author:
    Sujyonta.Kumar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExcelReader(java.lang.String path)
      ExcelReader(String path) constructor accepts only the path of the Excel sheet.
      ExcelReader(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String sheetName)
      ExcelReader(String path, String SheetName) constructor accepts the path of the Excel sheet with its Name and the workSheetName.

      getRowData - reads the data from spreadsheet for the matching rowNumber specified and returns the data as a Map collection with the rowHeaders of the work-sheet as key and the corresponding row as value.

    • Method Detail

      • getCellValue

        public java.lang.String getCellValue(int row,
                                     int col)
        This method returns the String value of the cell content which matches for the specified row number and column number.
        Parameters:
        row - - Row Number
        col - - column Number
        Returns:
        String Note: Row number and column numbers start from index 0.

      • getFormatedValue

        public java.lang.String getFormatedValue(int row,
                                         int col)
        This method returns the String value of the cell content. If Date cell matches then using date format as yyyy-MM-dd.
        Parameters:
        row - - Row Number
        col - - column Number
        Returns:
        String Note: Row number and column numbers start from index 0.

      • getCellValue

        public java.lang.String getCellValue(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                     int row,
                                     int col)
        This overloaded method returns the String value of the cell content which matches for the specified SheetName, column number and row number.
        Parameters:
        sheetName - - String value of the workSheetName
        row - - Row Number
        col - - column Number
        Returns:
        String Note: column numbers start from index 0.

      • getCellValueByFormat

        public java.lang.Object getCellValueByFormat(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                             int row,
                                             int col)
        This overloaded method returns the String value of the cell content which matches for the specified SheetName, row number and column number. This will gets a String, Numeric or Boolean from the cell as an Object return type.
        Parameters:
        sheetName - - String value of the workSheetName
        row - - Row Number
        col - - column Number
        Returns:
        Object (as a String, Double or Boolean)

        public int getRowCount(java.lang.String sheetName)

        Returns:
        integer

      • setCellData

        public boolean setCellData(java.lang.String sheetName,
                           java.lang.String colName,
                           int rowNum,
                           java.lang.String data)
        This method is to set String value in Excel file.
        Parameters:
        sheetName - is workSheet Name in which value need to be set
        colName - is to find particular column to set value
        rowNum - is to find particular cell to set value
        data - is the string to set
        Returns:
        Boolean whether data added or not

      • getRowData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRowData(int rownumber)
        getRowData - reads the data from spreadsheet for the matching rowNumber specified and returns the data as a Map collection with the rowHeaders of the work-sheet as key and the corresponding row as value.
        Parameters:
        rownumber - - rowN Number for which the values needs to be mapped to Column Headers
        Returns:
        Map

      • getMapDataFromSpreadSheet

        public java.lang.Object[][] getMapDataFromSpreadSheet()
        This method will read an excel work sheet data and return the contents as Map.
        Parameters:
        worksheetPath - - path to the worksheet you want to read data from.
        worksheetName - - worksheet's name.
        Returns:
        Object[][] - a multi dimensional object array whose elements are Map
